content: Filipe A. N. Verri received the BSc degree (Hons.) in computer science and the DSc degree (Hons.) in computer science and computational mathematics from the University of São Paulo, in 2014 and 2018, respectively. He was a Visiting Scholar with the School of Electrical, Computer and Energy Engineering, Arizona State University, under the supervision of Prof. Y.-C. Lai, in 2016. He is currently an Affiliate Professor with ITA and Unifesp. His research interests include data science, machine learning, complex networks, and complex systems.
summary: Filipe A. N. title: Filipe A. N. Verri

content:
Slides can be added in a few ways:
Create slides using Wowchemy’s Slides feature and link using slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file Upload an existing slide deck to static/ and link using url_slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file Embed your slides (e.g. Google Slides) or presentation video on this page using shortcodes. Further event details, including page elements such as image galleries, can be added to the body of this page.
title: Example Event

content:
The Innovation Office (IO) of Instituto Curvelo is responsible for coordinating technological innovation and technology transfer activities. Its main activities include:
Safeguarding the Innovation Policy of Instituto Curvelo Managing intellectual property assets Identifying and creating opportunities Leveraging resources from national public policies Managing and promoting partnerships The IO is led by the Innovation Director, Flavio T. J. Pereira.
summary:

title: Innovation Office

content:
The Research and Development Center (R&DC) is our unit for conducting Research and Development (R&D) activities, which include:
Prospecting and executing projects Managing the team of collaborators Establishing the Technical-Scientific Council Establishing, overseeing, and managing laboratories Being directly responsible for processes associated with the management model Technical-Scientific Council The Technical-Scientific Council is composed of representatives from the education sector or other research institutes with strong connections to various members of the technological knowledge production value chain. It ensures our relationship with academia and maintains high management standards through the management model.
Laboratories Electronics and Devices Laboratory Manufacturing Systems and Automation Laboratory Information Systems Laboratory The R&DC is led by the Scientific Director, Filipe A. N. Verri.
summary:

It ensures our relationship with academia and maintains high management standards through the management model.
